content.html: Elon is the worlds wealthiest man, w the ability to pull in software engineers and ad constructs from his other companies. If he would have gotten away with this successfully: you bet other founders would have followed, treating their staff like this. Treat people with respect.
content.value:
Elon is the worlds wealthiest man, w the ability to pull in software engineers and ad constructs from his other companies.

If he would have gotten away with this successfully: you bet other founders would have followed, treating their staff like this.

Treat people with respect.
